column4: although I'm pretty sure this'll fail, have you tried mounting the Windows partition and running sudo update-grub?

umm, why doesn't it mount?
erroe mounting exited with code 1 only root can mount .... this msg when i try to mount

sudo mount /dev/$block /media/$block
